value:
We were neutral and chose not to
commune with others... I believed
that was as it should be...

I fought side by side with Altina and
Soan under the watchful protection
of the goddess Ashera.

Ambition can lead to growth, and with
wisdom to temper it, one can avoid
making enemies along the way.

This is festival garb, hm? I am used
to black—but I could grow used to
this extravagance as well...

Imagine this festival celebrated
by all peoples, hand-in-hand...
That is something to aspire to.

I am Goldoa's king, Dheginsea.
I have come calling the castle
of $Nf.

The Three Heroes are not to be
looked down upon.
Little better than a flailing youth...
An embarrassment...

I will rise to meet your expectations.
Of that you can be sure.

I am Dheginsea, Goldoa's king and
one of the Three Heroes under the
protection of the goddess Ashera.$k$pNow, I hear that this harvest festival
has some connection to dragons...
Is that true?

This harvest festival celebration
is fascinating to me. I've been
thinking, $Nu...$k$pYou beorc sow seeds and then
harvest the bounty of the land...$k$pIt is not unlike how you sow a culture
of hope into your comrades, as I
see it.$k$pThe fruit of war is only more war,
a cycle that spells ruin to all that
lives—and what has yet to come.$k$pBut seeds of hope you sow can be
harvested for generations, nourishing
the future.$k$pHope is a legacy worth leaving.
はあっ
よこすがいい
ぐっ…
見事…
Are you frightened of dragons?
I will take my tribute in sweets!
Goldoa wills it!
Have a blessed harvest!
Unexpected...
ふふ…
Thank you for the invitation to this harvest festival. I believe I will enjoy it.
If it's candy you are after, I have amassed something of a stockpile.
To think that I would be taking my ease in a place like this... Fate is a curious thing.
I have never worn a...costume before. I suppose there is a first time for everything.
Beorc and laguz seem equally happy in this world. I am beginning to see its merits, myself.
My children have long since grown, but to see young ones here fussing over sweets...I am reminded of those times.
It is rare for me to have such a wonderful time. You have my sincerest gratitude.
Guide me.
I'll consider it...
Let the harvest begin.
